name: The KK Group
slogan: We empower women to make connections socially, sexually, romantically and professionally
description:
We create online and offline experiences that empower and sexually liberate women and couples around the world, including

*Killing Kittens*
The brand that started a movement. Killing Kittens is the ultimate adult party brand that’s been creating headlines and empowering women and couples since 2005.

*Kitten's World*
A female-first adult social network which offers a unique platform for creating social and romantic connections in a safe and fun environment. 

*Kurious*
A wonderful world of social events, live burlesque shows, inspiring talks and entertainment. For those who are just a little bit Kurious.

*SafeDate*
SafeDate is a lifesaving mobile app that offers peace of mind when dating. Go on dates knowing that your Safe Mates have got your back. Securely and privately.

*Sistr*
Sistr connects business women with Sistrs; professional female experts on-demand, who provide micro-consultancies in person or on video.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Emma Sayle
team.bioHtml: Founder of Killing Kittens and the KK Group, SafeDate App & The Sisterhood group | Author of 'Behind The Mask' (Harper Collins)

team.name: Craig Curchin
team.bioHtml: COO and Co-Founder of Swift Social. Strong Frontend Developement and entrepreneurial background. Interests in gaming, football, tech and Coffee.

team.title: COO
team.name: Hadleigh Bolt
team.bioHtml: Founder @DemoBox, @AudioTribe

jobs.title: Performance marketing / growth hacking manager
jobs.description:
ABOUT THE KK GROUP

KK is a group of companies that empower women to make connections socially, sexually, romantically and professionally. We create experiences, both online and offline that inspire the next generation of independent women.

CULTURE

• Our culture is our biggest asset - we really care about our mission of empowering women in every aspect of their lives.

• We have a core team of very talented people working behind the scenes to make sure that our community have a great experience - everyone from the marketing team to product developers.

• We’re always thinking of new ways to make things better, and that work ethic is really apparent in the office and from our remote workers. KK is hard work but always lots of fun.

• We want attitude, we want you to take risks and recognise that failure is just part of the journey.

• We want you to love people, love socialising, love working as a team.
 
• We want you to be rebellious and constantly challenge the world around you and always look for for opportunities to improve and innovate.


THE ROLE

This is a hands-on and challenging role where you’ll be responsible for the coordination of online marketing campaigns to drive customer acquisition and revenue growth across the KK group of brands. You will be directly responsible for managing our online marketing campaigns, ensuring they successfully align with our business objectives. It’s key that you can identify the necessary roles and outsourced resources required in which to accomplish our marketing objectives.


REQUIREMENTS

• Experience and proven background in generating user growth in digital applications

• Experience in using an agile approach to creating, analysing and executing campaigns to budget

• The ability to coordinate and execute digital marketing strategies across multiple brands using cutting edge growth tactics and initiatives

• Have a good understanding of the journey from customer to advocate and each touch point

• A deep understanding of how full stack digital marketing campaigns will align with brand values as well as business objectives

• An analytical mindset and understanding of key metrics with a relentless drive for performance to optimise our marketing campaigns for maximum efficiency and effectiveness.

• The ability to work in a fast-growing high-pressure environment

• The desire to work in an interesting yet challenging environment with the ambition of making real change in the world

• Experience using marketing specific tools

• Exceptional organisational skills

• Excellent communication both verbal and written

• Knowledge of all elements to build a campaign and how to manage internal and external specialists to deliver, using a common marketing stack, including:  

- Display
- SEO
- Paid Search
- Affiliate
- Social Media/Paid and Influencer
- CRO
- ASO
- SEM
- Content


ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

• Create, manage, and analyse online marketing campaigns across display, search, affiliates, and social media to ensure acquisition and conversion goals are met

• Daily management and overviewing of online marketing campaigns including A/B testing, landing page optimisation, budget management, creative testing, etc.

• Research, collect, and analyse data, leverage internal and external resources, and data sources to report on successes and actionable opportunities for the online marketing campaigns.

• Generate and disseminate management reporting to ensure that the wider team is aware of campaign performance trends

• Collaborate with design team to develop new and iterative creative concepts, develop A/B test schedule, interpret results, and recommend next steps

• Develop and test new campaigns to better target users and improve overall ROI

• Attend and be an ambassador for the KK group at our partner events including at Google HQ

HIRING POLICY

• Equal rights opportunities

jobs.title: Senior Mobile App Developer
jobs.description:
ABOUT THE KK GROUP

KK is a group of companies that empower women to make connections socially, sexually, romantically and professionally. We create experiences, both online and offline that inspire the next generation of independent women.

CULTURE

• Our culture is our biggest asset - we really care about our mission of empowering women in every aspect of their lives.

• We have a core team of very talented people working behind the scenes to make sure that our community have a great experience - everyone from the marketing team to product developers.

• We’re always thinking of new ways to make things better, and that work ethic is really apparent in the office and from our remote workers. KK is hard work but always lots of fun.

• We want attitude, we want you to take risks and recognise that failure is just part of the journey.

• We want you to love people, love socialising, love working as a team.
 
• We want you to be rebellious and constantly challenge the world around you and always look for opportunities to improve and innovate.


THE ROLE

We currently have an extremely exciting position open for a Mobile Applications Developer who will be taking a leading role in building our new mobile apps. We’re looking for talented & passionate individuals who have demonstrable commercial experience (3-5 years) of building Android or iOS Mobile platforms from inception through to release and onwards.

REQUIREMENTS

• Knowledge of Javascript and latest web technologies (HTML5/CSS3), specifically experience with Angular 2.

• Experience with mobile frameworks such as NativeScript (preferred) or React Native.

• Experience with XCode, and Android Studio.

• Experience integrating with back-end web services using REST/JSON APIs

• Experience of cross-platform mobile development (iOS/Android)

• Experience of Appstore/Google Play management

• Have a passion for building applications that are appealing and provide excellent usability

• Be up-to-date with the latest industry practices and can recommend which frameworks best meet the project requirements.

• Experience working as part of an Agile / Scrum team

• Respond to challenges constructively working with collaboratively with team members to define the solution.

• Ability to operate in a highly collaborative manner across multiple stakeholders

• Communicate effectively with stakeholders

• Target oriented and self-motivated with an ambition to exceed targets and expectations

• Have pride in the applications on which they work striving to build user experiences that win awards

• You’ll need to have relevant commercial experience (3-5 years) and proof of launching commercial products to market. A degree is not necessary if you have a strong portfolio and references.

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

• Building scalable apps across multiple platforms and device resolutions

• End to End App Development – New apps (highly important)

• Taking over existing mobile projects for maintenance and amendments

• Submissions to the App Store or Google Play

• Working with the UX team to agree features, flows and functionality

• Working closely with our web developers to build our new apps

HIRING POLICY

• Equal rights opportunities

jobs.title: VueJS Developer
jobs.description:
ABOUT THE KK GROUP

KK is a group of companies that empower women to make connections socially, sexually, romantically and professionally. We create experiences, both online and offline that inspire the next generation of independent women.

CULTURE

- Our culture is our biggest asset - we really care about our mission of empowering women in every aspect of their lives.
- We have a core team of very talented people working behind the scenes to make sure that our community have a great experience - everyone from the marketing team to product developers.
- We’re always thinking of new ways to make things better, and that work ethic is really apparent in the office and from our remote workers. KK is hard work but always lots of fun.
- We want attitude, we want you to take risks and recognise that failure is just part of the journey.
- We want you to love people, love socialising, love working as a team. 
- We want you to be rebellious and constantly challenge the world around you and always look for opportunities to improve and innovate.

THE ROLE

We currently have an extremely exciting position open for a VueJS Developer who will be working with our existing team to develop our web app. We’re looking for talented & passionate individuals who have demonstrable commercial experience of building modern frontend systems using Vue.

REQUIREMENTS

- Highly experienced in Javascript, preferably with Single Page Applications and VueJS.
- Up-to-date and proficient with latest web technologies (HTML5/CSS3)
- Experience working as part of an Agile / Scrum team
- Respond to challenges constructively working collaboratively with team members to define the solution.
- Be up-to-date with the latest industry practices and can recommend solutions which best meet the project requirements.
- Ability to operate in a highly collaborative manner across multiple stakeholders
- Communicate effectively with stakeholders
- Target oriented and self-motivated with an ambition to exceed targets and expectations
- Have pride in the applications on which they work striving to build user experiences that win awards
- You’ll need to have relevant commercial experience (3-5 years) and proof of launching commercial products to market. A degree is not necessary if you have a strong portfolio and references.

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

- Building scalable web apps across multiple platforms and device resolutions
- Working with the UX team to agree features, flows and functionality
- Working closely with our team to build our new apps

HIRING POLICY

- Equal rights opportunities
